00033 class ConfigurationDataBase;

00038 class Filter;

00050 class Filter: public Object {
00051 private:
00052 OBJECT_DLL_STUFF(Filter)
00053 private:
00054 
00056     friend bool FilterInit(Filter &f,ConfigurationDataBase &cdb);
00057 
00059     friend bool FilterResize(Filter &f,int inputSize,int outputSize);
00060 
00062     int inputSize;
00063 
00065     int outputSize;
00066 
00068     float *inputStatus;
00069 
00071     float *outputStatus;
00072 
00074     double *inputCoefficients;
00075 
00077     double *outputCoefficients;
00078 
00079 private:
00080     bool InitP(ConfigurationDataBase &cdb);
00081     bool Resize(int inputSize,int outputSize);
00082 
00083 public:
00085     ~Filter(){
00086         FilterResize(*this,0,0);
00087     }
00088 
00090     Filter(){
00091         inputSize           = 0;
00092         outputSize          = 0;
00093         inputStatus         = NULL;
00094         outputStatus        = NULL;
00095         inputCoefficients   = NULL;
00096         outputCoefficients  = NULL;
00097     }
00098 
00132     bool Init(ConfigurationDataBase &cdb){
00133         return FilterInit(*this,cdb);
00134     }
00135 
00137     inline void Reset(float input=0.0,float output=0.0){
00138         int j;
00139         for (j = 0;j < inputSize;j++){
00140             inputStatus[j]  = input;
00141         }
00142         for (j = 0;j < outputSize;j++){
00143             outputStatus[j] = output;
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00147 #if !defined(_CINT)
00148 
00149     inline float Process(float input){
00150 
00151         int j = 0;
00152         // update inputs memory
00153         for (j=inputSize-1;j > 0;j--){
00154             inputStatus[j] = inputStatus[j-1];
00155         }
00156         inputStatus[0] = input;
00157 
00158         // calculate the filter
00159         float output = 0.0;
00160         const float *filterStatus = inputStatus;
00161         const double *filterCoeffs = inputCoefficients;
00162 
00163         for (j = 0;j < inputSize;j++)
00164             output += filterStatus[j] * filterCoeffs[j];
00165 
00166         filterStatus = outputStatus;
00167         filterCoeffs = outputCoefficients;
00168 
00169         // update outputs memory
00170         for (j = outputSize-1;j > 0;j--){
00171             outputStatus[j] = outputStatus[j-1];
00172         }
00173 
00174         for (j = 1;j < outputSize;j++)
00175             output += filterStatus[j] * filterCoeffs[j];
00176 
00177         outputStatus[0] = output;
00178 
00179         return output;
00180     }
00181 #endif
00182 };
